title: Crash when clicking community channel
body:
# Bug Report

## Description

Using [StatusIm-Desktop-v0.14.0-rc.1-8d2cac-aarch64.dmg](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/releases/download/untagged-c98d33348b4c633a81b4/StatusIm-Desktop-v0.14.0-rc.1-8d2cac-aarch64.dmg)

I was in the checking out some messages in a community. Then I clicked one of the channels which had new messages (highlighted), and Status crashed.

Crash report:

[CrashReport.txt](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/files/12438901/CrashReport.txt)

Last lines of geth log:

Ok it's now crashing right after login
[app_20230825_092250.log](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/files/12439052/app_20230825_092250.log)
[geth.log.zip](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/files/12439057/geth.log.zip)
